name: GlobalWarmingFacts
0:
”Alexa ask global warming facts to tell me a fact”
”Alexa start global warming facts”
”Alexa launch global warming facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: global warming facts
des: These facts provide you with information about global warming which is a serious concern for ours to think about our earth. Our earth is in danger due to global warming. These facts let you ponder over the effect of this major epidemic disease and hope as a social being it is our sacred duty to join our hands and take a pledge to control pollution, maintain a healthy environment and think over sustainable development.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
